title: IPL fantasy auction-style team builder with 11-player teams, points, and multi-user support

requirements.text: Implement Internet Identity login and use the authenticated principal to scope all user data so different users can create and manage their own teams independently.

quotes: different user can be create in our own teams

acceptanceCriteria: A user can sign in with Internet Identity and see only their own teams and selections.
Signing out and signing in as a different identity shows a different set of teams (no data leakage).

requirements.text: Create a core data model for an IPL fantasy/auction-style app: players (name, role, team/club, base cost/value, and a points value or points history), user teams, and team rosters.

quotes: i want create web for ipl action based easy way

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes query methods to list available players and fetch a user’s teams.
Backend exposes update methods to create a team and modify its roster.
All stored records are associated with the authenticated principal.

requirements.text: Enforce the rule that each created team must have exactly 11 selected members, including clear validation errors when users try to save with fewer/more than 11 players.
acceptanceCriteria: UI prevents finalizing/saving a roster unless it contains exactly 11 players (or shows an explicit error message).
Backend rejects any roster updates that would result in a team having fewer than 11 or more than 11 players (with a clear error type/message).
A team details view shows the current count (e.g., “8/11 selected”).

requirements.text: Implement a points-based system for selected players and team totals, including UI to display per-player points and a computed team total points for each user team.
acceptanceCriteria: Each player displays a points value in the player list and within the team roster.
Each team displays a total points value computed from its 11 selected players.
Points totals update after roster changes (add/remove players).

requirements.text: Build an action-based, easy step-by-step workflow UI: (1) create a team (name), (2) browse/filter/search players and select them, (3) review roster (must be 11) and confirm, (4) view/manage existing teams.
acceptanceCriteria: There is a clear navigation flow that guides users through team creation, player selection, and review/confirmation.
Users can search and filter players (at minimum by name and role).
Users can remove players from the roster and replace them before confirming.

requirements.text: Provide a consistent visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) suitable for a cricket/league feel, and apply it across all pages without using a blue/purple primary palette.
acceptanceCriteria: All primary UI surfaces (header, buttons, cards, tables/lists) follow one coherent theme.
Primary color scheme is not blue/purple-dominant.
Design is consistent across login, team creation, player selection, and team views.

requirements.text: Add generated static images to the frontend and use them in the UI (e.g., app logo and a hero/background illustration) by placing them under frontend/public/assets/generated and referencing them directly from the frontend.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames.
UI references these images via static paths (no backend image serving).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no additional backend services).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrapping paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (work around them via composition/usage).
All user-facing text must be in English.
nonGoals: Real-time live IPL match integrations or automatic stat ingestion from third-party APIs.
Third-party authentication providers other than Internet Identity.
Payments, wallet integrations, or monetization features.
Real-time multiplayer auction rooms or WebSocket-based live bidding.

required: Cricket-themed app logo with a bat/ball silhouette in a warm sporty palette (ipl-fantasy-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Stylized cricket stadium hero illustration, clean and modern, warm sporty colors (cricket-stadium-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
